rowLayout.rollMessage:
${#concat( ?{diff:"Difficulté"|"0","Normal"|"50","Très facile"|"25","Facile"|"-25","Difficile"|"-50","Très difficile"}, ?{mod:"Modificateur"[number]|0} )}$ ${#competence:= switchCase(tactique,'AB',totalAB,'AN',totalAN,'AR',totalAR,'FE',totalFE,'PA',totalPA,'ES',totalES)}$ ${#xpAttr:= switchCase(tactique,'AB','xpFO','AN','xpAG','AR','xpRA','FE','xpRA','PA',totalPA,'ES',totalES)}$ ${#xpComp:= concat('xp', tactique)}$ ${#tactiqueAdverse:= fallback(fetchFromActor('target', 'tactique'),'Aucune')}$ ${#tactMod:= 20}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'AB'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'PA',10,'ES',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'AN'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'PA',10,'ES',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'AR'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'AN',10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'FE'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',20,'AN',10,'FE',-20,'PA',10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'PA'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',20,'AN',10,'AR',-10,'FE',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'ES'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'AR',-10,'FE',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#seuil:= max(competence + diff + mod + tactMod, 5)}$ ${#roll:= [1d100]}$ ${#ru:= roll%10}$ ${#result:= 0}$ ${#result:=(or(roll == 100, roll > seuil) ? 0 : 1)}$ ${#result:=(and(result==0, ru==1) ? -1 : result)}$ ${#result:=(and(result==1, ru==0) ? 2 : result)}$ ${#switchCase(result,-1,'Echec critique',0,'Echec',1,'Réussite',2,'Réussite critique','autre')}$ ${#or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpAttr, concat(xpAttr,'+1')) : ''}$ ${#or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpComp, concat(xpComp,'+1')) : ''}$ ${#dommage:= item.dommages}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 2, equalText(tactique, 'AB')) ? dommage+2 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 2, or(or(equalText(tactique, 'AN'), equalText(tactique, 'FE')), equalText(tactique, 'PA'))) ? dommage+1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 1, equalText(tactique, 'AB')) ? dommage+1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 1, equalText(tactique, 'AR')) ? dommage-1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= totalFO<=7 ? dommage-1 : and(totalFO>=15, totalFO<=20) ? dommage+1 : totalFO>=21 ? dommage+2 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= dommage<1 ? 1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= dommage>17 ? 17 : dommage}$ ${#blessures:= 0 }$ ${#blessures:= ru==1 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,1, 3,1, 4,1, 5,1, 6,2, 7,2, 8,3, 9,3, 10,4, 11,4, 12,5, 13,5, 14,6, 15,6, 16,7, 17,7) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==2 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,1, 3,1, 4,1, 5,2, 6,3, 7,4, 8,5, 9,6, 10,7, 11,8, 12,9, 13,10, 14,11, 15,12, 16,13, 17,14) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==3 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,1, 3,1, 4,2, 5,3, 6,5, 7,6, 8,8, 9,9, 10,11, 11,12, 12,14, 13,15, 14,17, 15,18, 16,20, 17,21) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==4 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,1, 3,2, 4,2, 5,4, 6,6, 7,8, 8,10, 9,12, 10,14, 11,16, 12,18, 13,20, 14,22, 15,24, 16,26, 17,28) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==5 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,1, 3,2, 4,3, 5,5, 6,8, 7,10, 8,13, 9,15, 10,18, 11,20, 12,23, 13,25, 14,28, 15,30, 16,33, 17,35) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==6 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,2, 3,2, 4,3, 5,6, 6,9, 7,12, 8,15, 9,18, 10,21, 11,24, 12,27, 13,30, 14,33, 15,36, 16,39, 17,42) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==7 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,2, 3,3, 4,4, 5,7, 6,11, 7,14, 8,18, 9,21, 10,25, 11,28, 12,32, 13,35, 14,39, 15,42, 16,46, 17,49) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==8 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,1, 2,2, 3,3, 4,4, 5,8, 6,12, 7,16, 8,20, 9,24, 10,28, 11,32, 12,36, 13,40, 14,44, 15,18, 16,52, 17,56) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==9 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,2, 2,2, 3,3, 4,5, 5,9, 6,14, 7,18, 8,23, 9,27, 10,32, 11,36, 12,41, 13,45, 14,50, 15,54, 16,59, 17,63) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==0 ? switchCase(dommage, 1,2, 2,2, 3,3, 4,5, 5,10, 6,15, 7,20, 8,25, 9,30, 10,35, 11,40, 12,45, 13,50, 14,55, 15,60, 16,65, 17,70) : blessures}$ ${#dizaine:= floor(roll/10)}$ ${#dizaine:= dizaine == 10 ? 0 : dizaine}$ ${#loc:= ru*10+dizaine}$ ${#loc:= loc>90 ? "Jambe gauche" : loc>80 ? "Jambe droite" : loc>65 ? "Abdomen" : loc>50 ? "Bras gauche" : loc>35 ? "Bras droit" : loc>10 ? "Torse" : "Tête"}$

${!switchCase(tactique,'AB','Attaque brutale','AN','Attaque normale','AR','Attaque rapide','FE','Feinte','PA','Parade','ES','Esquive','Aucune tactique')}$

${!result>0 ? concat("") : ''}$ ${!result>0 ? concat("") : ''}$

d100

${!roll}$ / ${!seuil}$

Compétence : ${!competence}$

Tactique adverse (${!tactiqueAdverse}$) : ${!tactMod}$

Difficulté : ${!switchCase(diff,"0","normale","50","très facile","25","facile","-25","difficile","-50","très difficile")}$ (${!diff}$)

Modificateur : ${!mod}$
Localisation",loc,"
RU",ru,"

Réussite" : result==2 ? "bl-roll-critical-success\">Réussite critique" : result==-1 ? "bl-roll-critical-fail\">Echec critique" : "bl-roll-fail\">Echec"}$

Blessures infligées

",blessures,"
